verbs.description: [ARG1: asian stocks] [V: mixed] [ARGM-TMP: after] wall street skids china slows global stocks were mixed friday after data showed chinese economic growth slowed more than expected but officials moved to shore up the country markets keeping score germany dax lost 0 3 percent to 11 556 and france cac-40 sank 0 8 percent to 5 078 london ftse 100 was flat at 7 028 and italy ftse mib dropped 1 3 percent to 18 831 amid concerns about a spat with the eu over the country budget on wall street the futures for the dow jones industrial average and for the standard poor 500 were both up 0 2 percent beijing taiwan seoul stephen innes india u s washington new york mercantile exchange china brent crude new zealand analyst tokyo southeast asia sydney hang seng london hong kong kospi
